official.question: Is this official IELTS?
official.answer: This platform is not affiliated with IELTS™. It provides mock tests for practice.

examiners.question: Who grades Writing & Speaking?
examiners.answer: Writing and Speaking tests are reviewed by experienced panelists/examiners.

duration.question: How long does it take to get results?
duration.answer: Listening and Reading scores are instant. Writing and Speaking feedback is provided within 24-48 hours.

mobile.question: Can I access it on mobile?
mobile.answer: Yes, our platform is fully responsive and accessible on mobile devices.

free_test.question: Is there a free test?
free_test.answer: Yes, we provide one free simulation test for every new user to try our platform.

writing_criteria.question: How is Writing graded?
writing_criteria.answer: Writing grading is based on official IELTS criteria: Task Achievement, Coherence & Cohesion, Lexical Resource, and Grammatical Range & Accuracy.

cancellation.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
cancellation.answer: Sure, you can cancel your subscription anytime via account settings without extra fees.
